comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: you have repeated Bain's erroneous dating of this photo as 1912; it should be 1914. (Wilson was not yet President in 1912.)

comment.author: 97609500@N00
comment._content: This is probably taken when Wilson addressed Congress regarding the arrest of a US Naval officer and men loading supplies in Tampico.  This incident led to the short occupation of Veracruz later in the year.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Wystan & Ken's Aviation: Yes, it seems the Bain caption cards, as well as the information on the photographs themselves, were in error here. We will adjust the information to reflect the correct date of April 20, 1914, as well as provide more context with the information swanq provided here. Wilson was addressing a joint session of Congress regarding the Tampico Incident of early 1914, as you also concluded, Ken. Thanks for the info!
